Highlights in Jazz #18: Big Band Sounds for the Seventies - Bill Watrous and the Manhattan Wildlife Refuge, Dr. Lyn Christie (Tape 3 of 3)
Highlights in Jazz #18: Big Band Sounds for the Seventies - Bill Watrous and the Manhattan Wildlife Refuge, Dr. Lyn Christie (Tape 3 of 3)

Original format: 1/2 inch open reel video; Transfer Technician Notes: "Only about half the tape has content recorded on it. As with other tapes in this collection, there is an inherent, constant sync error that is stabilized by time base correction, but ultimately results in moderate to severe flagging throughout. This flagging is generally above the performers, but intensifies on tighter shots. Mild image jitter throughout. Elsewhere, there are frequent mild dropouts, and occasional mild tape damage. Occasional inherent exposure adjustments and mild ghosting. Luma is adjusted to mitigate clipping from glare. Audio distortion is inherent to the original recording. Audio inherently cuts out for final 30 seconds of content."
